channel.title: create on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in create on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-03-11
item.description: Google’s Message app can now handle iMessage reactions, challenges Apple with new features (4 minute read) Google rolled out several product updates today, including improvements to Google Messages, Android widgets, Google TV, Google Photos, Nearby Share, Android Auto, and Accessibility features.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-03-03
item.description: Here’s everything Apple could announce at its March 8 ‘Peek performance’ special event (5 minute read) Apple will hold its ‘Peek Performance’ virtual event on March 8.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-17
item.description: Nvidia’s AI-powered scaling makes old games look better without a huge performance hit (3 minute read) Nvidia’s latest game-ready driver includes a tool called Deep Learning Dynamic Super Resolution (DLDSR) that can make most games look sharper.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-28
item.description: LG Display shows off a versatile lineup of transparent OLED screens at CES 2022 (3 minute read) LG Display has unveiled several new concepts that will be on display at CES 2022.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-09
item.description: Reddit to roll out personalized end-of-year recaps with stats about users’ habits (3 minute read) Reddit is rolling out a recap feature for all users that will include a summary of time spent on the platform, among other statistics.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-08
item.description: Cruise lays out its plan for ‘how’ it will make robotaxis a reality (7 minute read) GM’s self-driving subsidiary Cruise recently presented a roadmap for how the company will build autonomous vehicles that will be safer and more scalable than any human-driven vehicle.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-07
item.description: Virgin Hyperloop Shows off the Future: Mass Transport in Floating Magnetic Pods (3 minute read) Virgin Hyperloop is developing its technology at a site in the desert just north of Las Vegas.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-15
item.description: Exclusive: Here’s a first look at some more upcoming features in Android 12 (12 minute read) The first Android 12 developer preview was released nearly two months ago.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-19
item.description: Facebook’s upcoming AR wrist controllers will hijack your nerves (6 minute read) Facebook Reality Labs (FRL) has unveiled a wrist-mounted controller that reads neural impulses as they travel down the arm, translating them into commands.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-23
item.description: FDA approves remdesivir to treat COVID-19 (3 minute read) The FDA has approved remdesivir as a treatment for COVID-19 in hospitalized patients.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-08
item.description: The Supreme Court hears Oracle v. Google tomorrow—here’s what’s at stake (7 minute read) Oracle v.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-01
item.description: Google announces the Pixel 5 for $699 (3 minute read) The Google Pixel 5 will be available in eight countries on October 15th, then in the US on October 29th for $699.
